author: curious5088
content: Are there any stats on what percent of all validators run on centralized cloud providers?

author: raulj
content: There is some info you can get from block graffiti

author: raulj
content: And perhaps from ip address ranges of peers in the network corresponding to things such as google cloud, aws, etc.
